  • Method Details

    • buttonRemove

      public void buttonRemove​(javafx.event.Event e)
      method assigned to remove a card in the table, erasing it from both database and visual fxml
      Parameters:
      e - event when clicked.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Executed when the fxml is shown. It populates the columns with pokemon data.

    • showPokemonDetails

      private void showPokemonDetails​(PokemonCard card)
      Executed when a pokemon is selected in the table. Displays said selected pokemon info. If no card has been selected, keep it as null.
      Parameters:
      card - The info selected

    • setCentral

      public void setCentral​(Central central)
      sets central method
      Parameters:
      central -

    • handleNewPokemon

      private void handleNewPokemon()
      When the button to create a new pokemon card is selected, send a basic card with empty fields for user to fill.

    • handleEditPokemon

      private void handleEditPokemon()
      Called when the user clicks the edit button. Opens a dialog to edit details for the selected person.
